title: Minutes from Downtown, Medical Center and Galleria
posting_body: Relish in the luxurious interiors featuring chef inspired gourmet kitchens, opulent black galaxy granite counter tops, stainless appliance packages, and authentic hardwood floors - Black Galaxy Granite - Island Countertops - Stainless Steel Appliances - French Door Refrigerators - Large Soaking Tubs - Hardwood Floors - Large Closets - Ceiling Fans in Every Room - Programmable Digital Thermostats - Washer & Dryer - Built-In Desks - Glass Walk-in Shower - Gas Viking® Ranges and Cooktops - USB Charging Ports - Fitness CentersSparkling Pools - Gas Barbecue Grilling Stations - Fireplace Terrace - Canine Green Space - Covered Garage Parking - Tranquil Garden Spaces - Controlled Access -
Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability
